name: Defence War
description:
Defence War is a beautiful Tower Defence game which will test your strategic side as you defend off waves of enemies with a wide range of Turrets and weapons across 4 different worlds as you try rebuild Earth after a massive disaster.


  • The game features a Story mode that spans over 4 amazing maps on 4 different planets, each with its own unique look and feel.
  • Over 10 Turrets to build up each with their own strengths and weaknesses, from High caliber machine gun turrets to Plasma and laser turrets, you decide!
  • 3 Enemy types, Trucks, Tanks and Goliath's encourage different strategies.
  • Compete Online against your friends for the highest score in arcade mode!
  • Mini Map featured.
